summary: Diff implements the Alex Health rebrand across key UI surfaces, adds a significantly expanded marketing landing page, applies a refreshed theme via global CSS tokens (incl. dark mode variables), and improves authenticated UI polish with clearer nav active states plus reusable empty/loading states. However, the requested image asset updates are not evidenced in the diff summary, and a couple of unrequested behaviors (toasts and a custom navigation event) were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the app icon to reflect the "Alex Health" brand (app-icon.dim_512x512.png > app-icon.dim_512x512.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows the icon being referenced in UI, but does not show any asset/binary change for the icon itself, so the requested image edit cannot be verified as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Adjust the hero banner to better match the new "Alex Health" marketing story (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png > hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows the banner being referenced, but does not include evidence of the hero banner image file being updated (binary/assets not shown).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced toast/notification system usage (sonner Toaster and toast calls).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on rebrand, marketing content, and UI polish; it does not request adding a new notification/toast system or user-facing toast behaviors.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a global custom window event listener for "navigate-to-logs" to change views.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding a cross-component custom event navigation mechanism; it is additional behavior beyond stated UI polish requirements.
